title: USB Type C to Audio 3.5 mm suddenly not working
content:
My USB Type C adapter to 3.5mm jack audio suddenly it doesn't work

When i play PUBG suddenly audio isn't coming out and i can hear anything
So i unplug that adapter and sound is normal from stereo speaker
But when i plug in that adapter to usb type c port, the audio still coming out from stereo speaker
Pls help me
